channel.title: Anderson Research Group @ Cornell University
channel.description: This is the website for the Anderson Research Team at Cornell, where we investigate decarbonization of energy systems through renewable resources and demand side technologies.

item.title: Congratulations Vivienne Liu, on your new paper published in Energy!
item.description: Vivienne’s new paper (with Vivek Srikrishnan, Kenji Doering, Elnaz Kabir, Scott Steinschneider) appears in Energy. This paper illuminates potential vulnerabilities of zero-emission grids under long-term, high-resolution operational scenarios. The paper also identifies key challenges to propose solutions that maintain reliability and achieve our clean energy objectives. The article Congratulations Vivienne and team!

item.title: Congratulations Tayler Fernandez Nuńez on winning a NABEC Outstanding Poster Award!
item.description: Congratulations to Tayler! Tayler’s poster (with Badyn Milstein Tousenard) on “The Potential for Agrivoltaics in New York States’s Decarbonization Strategy” was awarded second place in the NABEC 2025 Outstanding Poster Competition. Great work!

item.title: Congratulations Dr. Alonso Alegre Bravo!
item.description: Congratulations to Dr. Alonso Alegre Bravo on successfully defending his Ph.D. dissertation (B-exam) on “Reframing Electricity Access in Rural Latin America: An Energy Justice-Oriented Analysis”. We are excited to see what you do next! Congrats!

item.title: Congratulations to Tayler Fernandez Nuñez on passing the A-exam!
item.description: Congratulations to Tayler on her successful A-exam! Great work!

item.title: Congrats Alonso, on your new paper published in Applied Energy!
item.description: Alonso’s new paper explores the role of electricity access and energy justice in Latin America. The article appears in Applied Energy. Congratulations Alonso!

item.title: Congratulations to Shriya Nagpal on successful defense of her PhD!
item.description: Congratulations to Dr. Shriya Nagpal on her successful B-exam! Post-defense picture to follow. We are thrilled for you. Best of luck on your new job as an Assistant Professor at Pitzer College - the students are lucky to have you!

item.title: Congratulations to Vivienne Liu on successful defense of her PhD!
item.description: Congratulations to Dr. Vivienne Liu on her successful B-exam! Post-defense picture to follow. We are thrilled for you and can’t wait to see the amazing things you will do at NREL.

item.title: Congratulations to Vivienne Liu on her new position at National Renewable Energy Lab!
item.description: Vivienne Liu will join the Grid Operations Planning Group in the Grid Planning and Analysis Center at NREL as a researcher, starting September 2023. Congratulations Vivienne!

item.title: Congratulations to Dr. Elnaz Kabir on her new tenure-track position at Texas A&M University!
item.description: Elnaz Kabir will join Texas A&M University as an Assistant Professor in the Department of Engineering Technology and Industrial Distribution, starting August 2023. Congratulations Elnaz!

item.title: Alonso receives the 2023 Latin American Studies Research Award from the Einaudi Center for International Studies at Cornell.
item.description: Alonso received the Einaudi 2023 LACS Research Award to support his preliminary field work in Guatemala this summer. Congratulations (and safe travels) Alonso!
